alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:05PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDuffie, south central Columbia, northwestern Burke, Richmond and southwestern Aiken Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near McBean and Harlem, or 9 miles north of Waynesboro, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Hephzibah, Harlem, Jackson, McBean, South Augusta, Augusta Regional Airport, Blythe, Dearing, Keysville, Leitner Lake Conference Center, Audubon`s Silver Bluff Sanctuary, New Savannah Bluff Lock & Dam Park, Adamsville, Bath-Edie, Pea Patch Aerodrome, Bennock Mill, Shell Bluff, Shell Bluff Landing and Ellwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
